name: The Last Equinox
description:
Please use the Windows download for now, the Web version is having issues after the first battle!

Make your way from battle to battle to stop the Spring Squad from stopping autumn!  Inspired by classics like Fire Emblem and Final Fantasy Tactics, this game puts you in the shoes of a gang of mighty heroes with different abilities and skills.  

Gameplay:

In battles, take each character and move forward and fight to ensure victory.  Grass terrain is normal, water is impassable, mud slows you down, and leaf piles increase your chance to dodge attacks.  When it is a character's turn, click any lit square to move there.  Then either click Attack and click the enemy you want to battle or click End to end your turn.  Guns and Dodgeballs have a range of 2, all else is 1 range.  Defeat all enemies to win. Please play on full screen!

Controls:  Main Map:

WASD - Move

E - Progress Dialogue

Space - Jump

Battles:

Mouse - Click Buttons on Screen

Clicking players show their stats

Buttons on the Left and Right sides of the screen rotate the map

Known Bugs: 

Some issues with the turn manager, doesn't always select the correct player to go or skips turns

Item button does nothing because I haven't implemented items

Trying to get the WebGL version working properly.  Please notify me if there are any game-breaking issues! :)

Probably has some other bugs, I had to rush at the end to get it out, as is tradition.

All assets made by me.
